Quick Q. for the floor - Do you know of open collaboration tools that support encryption and can be used by a “private” community.  As much as I realize this goes against the ethos of this community, we work on really sensitive issues, with serious risk of legal and physical targeting, and just can’t be public about our work. We still want to be openly collaborative within a vetted community though, and would love to
advice? I’m getting a little desperate with signal channels…. :confused:
following!
https://boingboing.net/2016/09/26/cryptpad-a-freeopen-end-to.html
cryptpad
Disclaimer: I HAVE NOT USED IT BEFORE. COULD BE BUGGY.
End-to-End encryption other than messaging is very hard to be implemented.
